title: question about loot
body: So i received some restrictions about a week ago and i served them but it still says i cant collect loot because of behavior.  Is it forever that I cant receive loot because of a punishment or is it temporary?

replies.body: The "3 months" thing is for how long it takes for your punishment tier to drop 1 step, and is not the same as your reform status concerning Hextech loot eligibility. It keeps being misquoted for this.

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4IaLOHLE,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-03-25T22:48:57.094+0000)
>
> The "3 months" thing is for how long it takes for your punishment tier to drop 1 step, and is not the same as your reform status concerning Hextech loot eligibility. It keeps being misquoted for this.

Is there any way to tell if this is effecting me? I haven't received anything as much as a warning but I haven't gotten hextech loot in about 4 games of S+ rank.

If you haven't received any punishments and aren't receiving chests, it's probably because you already earned a chest for that champion. Have you already received a chest for the champions you played? because you can only get 1 chest per champion per season, and 4 a month total. It doesn't matter who on your team earned the S to get the chest, that champion will be counted out once you get a chest while playing them.

For key fragments, they are random, and the drop rate will decrease as you get more (you're expected to only get a certain amount each month, resets each month).

Would be nice to know our Key Status too... haven't seen any in forever.

It's only temporary. If you stop exhibiting negative behavior and reform, the penalty will eventually lift. I have no estimation of how long this will take because it's variable per player.

There is currently no indication of your "reform status", but Riot NeuroCat said they will be adding something to make it visible.

Uninstall and reinstall the client. Voila! Thank me later. 

Oh, and don't get reported again.

>[Riot NeuroCat](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4ak56c/if_you_were_previously_bannedchat_banned_you_are/d11c1nm)
>We're working on putting out a better explanation for this. For players that are punished by the Instant Feedback system and work off the punishment, they will still be restricted from earning Hextech chests or keys for a period while the system ensures that they have reformed their behavior. **There is no fixed interval here** - if you continue to play with sportsmanlike behavior, you'll eventually get back into good standing. We're looking into making a player's status more clear/visible to help avoid this kind of confusion.

No fixed interval but not forever either.
